quotes.text: "I've seen a look in dogs' eyes, a quickly vanishing look of amazed contempt, and I am convinced that basically dogs think humans are nuts."
quotes.author: John Steinbeck, Travels with Charley

quotes.text: "And now that you don't have to be perfect, you can be good."
quotes.author: John Steinbeck, East of Eden

quotes.text: "It is the dull eventless times that have no duration whatever. A time splashed with interest, wounded with tragedy, crevassed with joy - that's the time that seems long in the memory. And this is right when you think about it. Eventlessness has no posts to drape duration on. From nothing to nothing is no time at all."
quotes.author: John Steinbeck, East of Eden

quotes.text: "Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less."
quotes.author: CS Lewis
Gabriel García Márquez, One Hundred Years of Solitude

quotes.text: "Its easy to make frends if you let pepul laff at you."
quotes.author: Daniel Keyes, Flowers for Algernon
